description: Exquisite craftsmanship featuring genuine diamonds and high-purity gold. The timeless design blends seamlessly with both traditional and contemporary attire. A valuable heirloom to be cherished for generations, this Kangan set represents a significant investment in beauty, tradition, and lasting value. The Hyderabadi polish lends a unique lustre and sheen, enhancing the jewelry's overall appeal. Each diamond is hand-selected, ensuring exceptional quality and brilliance.
